data.comment: Today's referee, Ted Unkel, has blown to start the match.
Today's referee, Ted Unkel, has blown to start the match.
Ball goes out of play for a Toronto goal kick.
Goal kick for Toronto at BMO Field.
In Toronto a free kick has been awarded the home team.
New York City drives forward and Alexandru Mitrita gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
New York City to take a throw-in in Toronto territory.
Throw-in for New York City in their own half.
Ted Unkel signals a free kick to New York City in their own half.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Alexander Callens for New York City who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Alexander Callens for New York City is back on the field again.
Toronto awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Toronto's Ifunanyachi Achara has run offside.
Toronto drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Ball safe as Toronto is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Toronto.
In Toronto New York City drive forward through Keaton Parks. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Can New York City capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Toronto's half?
Ted Unkel awards New York City a goal kick.
New York City awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ted Unkel signals a free kick to Toronto.
Alexander Ring (New York City) has received a first yellow card.
Alejandro Pozuelo for Toronto drives towards goal at BMO Field. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Ted Unkel awards the home team a throw-in.
Can New York City get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Toronto's half?
Toronto have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Toronto close to the penalty box.
Ted Unkel signals a New York City throw-in in Toronto's half.
Justin Morrow is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Throw-in for New York City in the half of Toronto.
Free kick for Toronto in the half of New York City.
Toronto's Omar Gonzalez gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Toronto.
Throw-in for New York City in the half of Toronto.
Throw-in for Toronto at BMO Field.
Can Toronto capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
James Sands is booked for the away team.
In Toronto, Alejandro Pozuelo of Toronto is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
New York City have a goal kick.
Toronto have been awarded a corner by Ted Unkel.
Toronto have a dangerous throw-in.
Ball safe as New York City is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Justin Morrow is back on the pitch.
Free kick for Toronto in their own half.
Jonathan Osorio gets his shot on target but fails to score for Toronto.
New York City awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ted Unkel signals a throw-in for Toronto, close to New York City's area.
[47] hits the bar! Very nearly a goal there for [48] in [27].
Throw-in for New York City at BMO Field.
Toronto's Marky Delgado gets in a shot on goal at BMO Field. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Toronto.
Ted Unkel awards the away team a throw-in.
The match at BMO Field has been interrupted briefly for a check on Keaton Parks, who is down injured.
6 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Free kick for Toronto in their own half.
Toronto pushes forward through Ifunanyachi Achara, whose finish on goal is saved.
Corner awarded to Toronto.
New York City awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ted Unkel signals a free kick to New York City in their own half.
Throw-in New York City.
Can Toronto get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in New York City's half?
New York City awarded a free kick in their own half.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second-half is now underway.
Toronto's Alejandro Pozuelo is on target but unsuccessful.
Toronto needs to be cautious. New York City have an attacking throw-in.
New York City's Keaton Parks is back in action after a slight knock.
Throw-in for New York City in their own half.
Throw-in Toronto.
Important block from the Toronto defence as Alexandru Mitrita fires in a strike for New York City.
New York City have been awarded a corner by Ted Unkel.
Throw-in for New York City at BMO Field.
Throw-in high up the field for New York City in Toronto.
Toronto awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Toronto are coming forward and Jozy Altidore gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Toronto.
Ted Unkel awards Toronto a goal kick.
Ted Unkel waits before resuming play because Erickson Gallardo for Toronto is still down.
Erickson Gallardo is back on his feet again.
Richie Laryea (Toronto) has replaced the possibly injured Erickson Gallardo.
Goal kick for Toronto at BMO Field.
Throw-in for Toronto in their own half.
Ted Unkel awards the away team a throw-in.
Jesus Medina of New York City smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
New York City's Alexandru Mitrita misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Toronto goal kick.
Alexander Ring for New York City gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Toronto.
Can New York City capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Toronto's half?
Toronto to take a throw-in in New York City territory.
Ted Unkel signals a free kick to New York City in their own half.
Ted Unkel signals a New York City throw-in in Toronto's half.
Free kick Toronto.
Jozy Altidore (Toronto) strikes at BMO Field but his header is cleared.
Toronto have been awarded a corner by Ted Unkel.
Ball safe as New York City is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Toronto in their own half.
New York City's Keaton Parks has been booked in Toronto.
Corner awarded to Toronto.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in Toronto.
Toronto push forward at BMO Field and Jozy Altidore gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the New York City defence.
Free kick for Toronto in their own half.
Ronny Deila is making the team's first substitution at BMO Field with Ismael Tajouri replacing Jesus Medina.
New York City make their second substitution with Valentin Castellanos replacing Alexandru Mitrita.
Ted Unkel signals a free kick to Toronto in their own half.
Throw-in for Toronto at BMO Field.
Toronto's Marky Delgado breaks free at BMO Field. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for New York City at BMO Field.
Corner awarded to Toronto.
New York City awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ted Unkel signals a throw-in for New York City, close to Toronto's area.
Ted Unkel awards the away team a throw-in.
Toronto awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Toronto in Toronto.
Toronto have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Toronto in the half of New York City.
Throw-in for New York City in their own half.
The away team replace Maxi Moralez with Gary Mackay Steven.
Goal! Ifunanyachi Achara gives Toronto a 1-0 lead.
Ball safe as Toronto is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Toronto.
Jozy Altidore for the home team is judged to be offside.
New York City to take a throw-in in Toronto territory.
